aka: The Battle of the Sacred Tree

writer.name: 万吉鲁·金扬居 Wanjiru Kinyanjui

director.name: 万吉鲁·金扬居 Wanjiru Kinyanjui

this_title: Der Kampf um den heiligen Baum
trans_title: The Battle of the Sacred Tree
introduction: Mumbi leaves Nairobi for her ancestral village and gets into a quarrel with a Christian women’s group seeking to eradicate the remains of pre-colonial belief systems. Wanjiru Kinyanjui graduated from the DFFB with this smart comedy shot in Kenya.源自：https://www.berlinale.de/en/2023/programme/202314590.html
foreign_title: Der Kampf um den heiligen Baum
